com.salesforce.androidsdk.analytics.logger

Class SalesforceLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.analytics.logger.SalesforceLogger

  • public class SalesforceLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple logger that allows components to log statements of different log levels. This class also provides the ability to break down logs at the component level and set different log levels for different components. The available options for log output are console and file.
    Author:
    bhariharan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SalesforceLogger.Level
      An enumeration of log levels.

    • Method Detail

      • setLogReceiverFactory

        public static void setLogReceiverFactory(SalesforceLogReceiverFactory logReceiverFactory)
        Sets the factory for Salesforce log receivers.
        Parameters:
        logReceiverFactory - The factory for Salesforce log receivers

      • getLogger

        public static SalesforceLogger getLogger(java.lang.String componentName,
                                         Context context)
        Returns the Salesforce logger instance associated with the named component. The logger will be created if needed and without any additional Salesforce log receiver.
        Parameters:
        componentName - The component name
        context - The Android context
        Returns:
        Either a new or existing Salesforce logger for the named component

      • getLogger

        public static SalesforceLogger getLogger(java.lang.String componentName,
                                         Context context,
                                         SalesforceLogReceiver salesforceLogReceiver)
        Returns the Salesforce logger instance associated with the named component. The logger will be created if needed and with the specified Salesforce log receiver.
        Parameters:
        componentName - The component name
        context - The Android context
        salesforceLogReceiver - The Salesforce log receiver to receive all logs issued by the Salesforce logger
        Returns:
        Either a new or existing Salesforce logger for the named component

      • getComponents

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getComponents()
        Returns the set of components that have loggers associated with them.
        Returns:
        Set of components being logged.

      • flushComponents

        public static void flushComponents()
        Wipes all components currently being logged. Used only by tests.

      • getFileLogger

        public FileLogger getFileLogger()
        Returns the instance of FileLogger associated with this component.
        Returns:
        FileLogger instance.

        public SalesforceLogger.Level getLogLevel()

        public void disableFileLogging()
        Disables file logging.

      • enableFileLogging

        public void enableFileLogging(int maxSize)
        Enables file logging.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - Maximum number of log lines allowed to be stored at a time.

      • isFileLoggingEnabled

        public boolean isFileLoggingEnabled()
        Returns if file logging is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        True - if enabled, False - otherwise.
